text.autoconfig.third_person_maps.title: Third Person Maps Config
text.autoconfig.third_person_maps.option: Scale the mini-map to a given % of the height of your screen.
Enter an integer which will offset the map horizontally in your right hand
Enter an integer which will offset the map vertically in your right hand
Enter an integer which will offset the map horizontally in your left hand
Enter an integer which will offset the map vertically in your left hand
